extendedInfo.description: I've added a screenshot of all of the dungeon armors available in GW2 for each race and gender. You just select the dungeon, race, armor class (light/medium/heavy), and gender and this app does the rest.There are a ton more features planned and I'm ALWAYS open to new ideas. So leave a comment or an email and I'll try to implement anything you guys think would help!Hopefully by the end of this week I will have all of the dungeon WEAPONS added as well, and begin working on the cultural and karma sets.Eventually this app will not house the images itself as it will begin to be a bit unwieldy so stay tuned for changes.

reviews.comment: It\'s an okay app, was hoping it would be more like the wow model viewer. Would be awesome if more armour was added and give the ability to swap items in individual slots etc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC Desire
reviews.comment: HTC Desire: -Selection boxes always blacked out, cant read -Settings window does not open -Needs cultural armor sets  Thanks for this app, looking forward for updates! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great work, thank you :)  Now to make my dream a reality!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent App!
reviews.comment: You wanted ideas. Maybe a little over ambitious..But we need 360 rotatable 3d models. Pinch zooming. Individual armor databases where we can mix and match coats, boots, gloves, etc from all the armor sets, color customization.. Stats added as well for all armour sets. I know that would be overwhelming but I know you can do it! You need funding though for a true portable replica of the locker for GW2 and hire on some talent... I would definitely donate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App to start.
reviews.comment: It would be great if you can somehow tailor it so that we can see different views of the armor such as the back, sides, etc. Also,  another idea is to add Cultural, Named, and Karma armor. I know it\'s already on a website but I can\'t access it readily and have to pinch zoom on my mobile browser, just one of those mini mini mini inconveniences. Much thanks though. This is really great so I know which dungeons to plow through.
reviews.author: Jason Dasco

reviews.title: Good but useless
reviews.comment: Pointless, it only shows costumes for the dungeons. That\'s it.
reviews.author: Maaz Mahmood

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: If you could add all 3 tiers of cultural armor for all races and armor class and maybe add starter dyes to selection
reviews.author: Ryan Cultrera

reviews.title: Very little content
reviews.comment: I was hoping for an app where you could see what your character would look like with any weapon/armor set on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: App runs extremely smoothly and looks good. Would love to see dye options at some point. Keep up the good work!

reviews.title: Its free
reviews.comment: Probably the only thing this app has to offer. The website for guild wars 2 makes this app pretty useless. Go on their web page and take ideas from there.

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Maybe add weapons and karma armors?

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really good app, it is a nice idea. The wiki lacks in a few areas so things like this really help when you want your character to look their best! Would be great to see some other armour sets added in the future.

reviews.comment: Low pes pics, lack of armor options, glitched out armor on some of the pics, use better contrasting dyes in order to see armor detail better.

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: In the future please add every armor in the game :D

reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.comment: The application is simple and smooth, but I think it could really use the cultural armor appearances in addition to the dungeon gear.
